title: Transfer of Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (Commencement)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Oil Emergency Contingency and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Oil Emergency Contingency and 
Transfer of Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (Commencement) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited oil emergency contingency transfer renewable transport fuel function act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: Transfer of Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (Commencement)
heading: 2. The 28th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Oil
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Oil 
Emergency Contingency and Transfer of Renewable Transport Fuel Functions 
Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 February, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [81] 3
